text: wadarab allah mathalana liladhin amanuu maryam bnt eimran alati hfzt frjha, wsanth ean alzna, famr allah taealaa jbryl ealayh alslam 'ana yunfakh fi jayb qmysha, fwslt alnfkht 'iilaa rhmha, fhmlt bieisaa ealayh alslam, wsddaqt bikalimat rbha, waeamilat bshrayeh alty shreha lebadh, wakutubih almnzlt ealaa rslh, wakanat min almtyeyn lh
